original_title: K1 World MAX 2008 World Championship Tournament Final 8
overview: K-1 World MAX 2008 World Championship Tournament - Final 8 took place on July 7, 2008 at the Nippon Budokan in Tokyo, Japan. The Main card featured the four quarterfinals of the 8 man tournament format, with two Superfights and three newly created (60 kg/132 lb) weight class Super fights.
title: K1 World MAX 2008 World Championship Tournament Final 8
